about_the_game:
Spear Leap Saga : Forge Your Path To Express Your Last Wish...

Spear Leap Saga is an retro platformer where you must climb higher and higher to express your last wish at the night sky where it is said that wishes are granted. In this solitary quest, you'll not only master your jumps but also create your own platforms by throwing your spear with precision. Every fall is not an end, but a lesson that brings you closer to your ultimate goal.

Gameplay
Your only way forward is to jump ever higher, using your spear to create new platforms to stand on. Each throw must be perfectly calculated because a poorly prepared jump or a misplaced spear will send you plummeting down, forcing you to start again...
Master the art of spear-throwing to create your own paths to the summit. Timing and precision are essential to survive in this vertical world.
The most direct route isn’t always the safest. Use your spear to create platforms where there are none

Visual
Immerse yourself in a nostalgic journey through a mythologic world crafted in the iconic pixel art style reminiscent of classic Game Boy titles like Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3 and Mega Man: Dr. Wily's Revenge.

This retro atmosphere will make you feel like you’ve stepped back into the world of classic Game Boy adventures, where every pixel counts and every challenge feels timeless.

short_description: Embark on a daring journey in Spear Leap Saga! Climb higher and higher through a challenging platforming world, driven by a strong wish. Every leap brings you closer to the night sky, but be careful—one misstep could send you tumbling back down, putting your dream just out of reach...
